title: Learning Strategies for Improving Organizational Ambidexterity and Emotional Engagement

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of organizational management and learning theories
context.additional_context: A course where professionals in healthcare, legal, and technical fields learn strategies to simultaneously achieve organizational innovation (exploration) and efficiency (exploitation) while enhancing emotional engagement.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the concept of organizational ambidexterity and the interaction between exploration/exploitation activities.
Learners apply structural equation modeling (SEM) to analyze the relationship between organizational strategy and emotional engagement.
Learners can design and evaluate microlearning content that promotes exploration/exploitation activities in mobile environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
